title: Hunt for the Fallen
description: Eighteen year old Clara has gone through a lot recently. She graduated high school, celebrated with friends, and, oh, she's gotten herself killed. After meeting an angel who gives her life back in exchange for her assistance in saving human-kind, Clara has to grow up and grow up fast.Join Clara on her journey as she loves and loses many, gaining new friends along the way. All while finding a her place in the world between being a teenager and becoming an adult.This book, much like the lead character, is stuck in the genre between Young Adult and Adult, better known as New Adult. Suitable for readers of either. Mild language and mild sexual situations.
author: Christina Byus
